alert.note: Alert for Highlands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Highlands and southeastern Polk Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 358 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Lake Kissimmee to near Sebring Regional Airport. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sebring, Avon Park Air Force Range, Indian Lake Estates and River Ranch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
